welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Romainville, the charming city known for its rich history and picturesque streets. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and culture of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals and serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
